questions.title: Median of Two Sorted Arrays
questions.prompt: Given two sorted arrays nums1 and nums2 of size m and n, return the median of the two sorted arrays in O(log(min(m,n))) time.
followups: Why is binary search applicable here?
What edge cases make this problem tricky?
How does your solution guarantee logarithmic time?

questions.title: Word Ladder
questions.prompt: Given two words and a dictionary, find the length of the shortest transformation sequence from beginWord to endWord.
followups: Why is BFS preferred over DFS?
How do you optimize adjacency generation?
What is the time and space complexity?

questions.title: Course Schedule II
questions.prompt: Given prerequisites for courses, return a valid order to finish all courses or an empty array if impossible.
followups: How do you detect cycles?
What is the difference between DFS and BFS solutions?
How does this scale with large inputs?

questions.title: Serialize and Deserialize Binary Tree
questions.prompt: Design an algorithm to serialize and deserialize a binary tree.
followups: How do you handle null nodes?
What format would you choose and why?
What are the space implications?

questions.title: Longest Increasing Path in a Matrix
questions.prompt: Find the length of the longest increasing path in a matrix.
followups: Why is memoization needed?
What is the time complexity?
How do you avoid recomputation?

questions.title: Find All Critical Connections

questions.title: Sliding Window Maximum

questions.title: Edit Distance

questions.title: Maximum Profit with K Transactions
